attributes.action: Change the English national anthem to Jerusalem by William Blake.
attributes.background: “God save the King/Queen” has been our national anthem since 1745 and we can all agree it needs to be changed; for football, for rugby and all other sports. We need something passionate and emotional if we are ever going to dominate world sport and Jerusalem is the perfect anthem to bring it home.

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here: https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
